affectionI.name: Affection Contest: -006-Jigglypuff-
affectionI.description: Raise your affection with a basic Jigglypuff and who ever has the highest at the end of the event wins!
affectionI.rewards: A refund of all SHARDS and GEMS used to level, +1 level of SHARDS/GEMS, 350 POKEDOLLARS
